Parameter.description: external id of the community on the requester system.
array of wallets for the community, if not defined a default of three wallets is created ("manager", "users", "merchants").
type of the wallet (a "manager" wallet must exist in the array, other types are up to the requester).
external id of the wallet on the requester system.

Success 200.description: wallet type (one of the defaults - "manager", "users", "merchants" or custome defined).
wallet index the wallet is managed at by the provider.
external id of the community (defined by who ever created it).

examples.title: Error Example

title: Get quote for exchanging
name: GetQuote
description: Get quote from market maker for exchanging amount of fromToken to toToken. Optionally specify the market maker to use by id/address, or find the first one for the pair of tokens.

Parameter.description: token address of the token to sell
token address of the token to buy
amount of fromToken to sell in exchange for toToken as string

Success 200.description: the amount of toToken which will be received in exchange for amount of fromToken.

 "read": "2018-11-22T13:56:34.660Z"
}

title: Revert

examples.title: Error Example

Header.description: JWT token generated using OSSEUS_ROUTER_JWT_SECRET value from the config.

Parameter.description: transaction from array (currently supports only one object)
amount to transfer as string (for example: 100 can be sent as "100" or "1e2")
transaction to array (currently supports only one object)
amount to transfer as string (for example: 100 can be sent as "100" or "1e2")

examples.title: Error Example

Header.description: JWT token generated using OSSEUS_ROUTER_JWT_SECRET value from the config.

title: Transmit
name: Transmit
description:
Aggregate offchain transactions and transmit to blockchain.

Note that transactions are queued and transmitted serially.

The array of results contains the transmit ids which can be sampled to get the relevant blockchain transactions, which can also be sampled to get their respective statuses.

Parameter.description: currency id to filter transactions transmitted to the blockchain

examples.title: Error Example

Header.description: JWT token generated using OSSEUS_ROUTER_JWT_SECRET value from the config.

examples.title: Error Example

title: Mark BC transactions as known

description: Update a list of blockchain transactions to be known

Success 200.description: array of updated blockchain transaction unique ids

examples.title: Error Example

Header.description: JWT token generated using OSSEUS_ROUTER_JWT_SECRET value from the config.

title: Update BC transactions state
name: updateBlockchainTransactionsState
description: Update state of blockchain transactions to "DONE" (if mined into block) or "CONFIRMED" according to the "BLOCKS_TO_CONFIRM_BCTX" config parameter

Parameter.description: address (from/to) of blockchain transactions to filter by
type of blockchain transactions to filter by - ['TRANSFER', 'CHANGE', 'DEPOSIT']
number of blockchain transactions to check for state update (sorted by creation time)

array of balances per currency for wallet

the blockchain balance (as last synced on balance.blockNumberOfLastUpdate)
array of pending offchain transactions (should be empty if all is working)
